title: E290 Psychic Surgery Dreams and Christine's Principles of Magic
description: It's episode 290 and we're officially in the Troll Hole! This week Em brings us some nicks, knacks, nooks and crannies as well as the scary story of the Moundsville Penitentiary, just down the street from Mothman's hometown in West Virginia. Then Christine starts a two-parter for us on the wild and chilling tale of the Children of Thunder. Tune in to find out the most Gemini rule of all time... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer, Eva Gross)
